text: After long and earnest consideration, Her Majesty's Government have come to the conclusion that it would be right for Britain to make a formal application for negotiations with a view to joining the Community. At this point, Mr. Paul Williams (Cons., Sunderland) called out 'Shame.' Mr. Williams is a close associate of Mr. Fell.
handwritten_text: After long and earnest consideration, Her Majesty's Government have come to the conclusion that it would be right for Britain to make a formal application for negotiations with a view to joining the Community. At this point, Mr. Paul Williams (Cons., Sunderland) called out 'Shame.' Mr. Williams is a close associate of Mr. Fell.
